PropertyValue.Value: select t.para_type, t1.para_desc, case t.para_version_type when '00' then '草稿版本' when '01' then '当前版本' when '02' then '将来版本' when '03' then '历史版本' end para_version_type, case t.para_or_soft_flag when '01' then '参数' when '02' then '软件' end para_or_soft_flag, t.para_version, t.master_para_type, t.master_para_version, t.para_file_name, t.active_date, t.active_time from para_version_info t left join basi_para_type_info t1 on t1.para_type = t.para_type
